00020 #include "Group.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/Logger.h"
00022 #include <assert.h>
00023 
00024 namespace brics_3d {
00025 
00026 namespace rsg {
00027 
00028 Group::Group() {
00029         this->children.clear();
00030 }
00031 
00032 Group::~Group() {
00033 
00034         /*
00035          * clean up all "parent pointers" of all the children on deletion of this group,
00036          * otherwise they will point to nirvana....
00037          */
00038     for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00039     {
00040         getChild(i)->removeParent(this);
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void Group::addChild(NodePtr child) {
00045         insertChild(child, children.size());
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Group::insertChild(NodePtr child, unsigned int index) {
00049         assert(child != 0);
00050         assert(child.get() != 0);
00051 
00052         /* update parent-child relation */
00053         if (index >= children.size()) {
00054                 children.push_back(child);
00055         } else {
00056                 children.insert(children.begin() + index, child);
00057         }
00058 
00059         /* update child-parent relation */
00060         child->addParent(this); // TODO does this create to many reference counts? => use <boost/enable_shared_from_this.hpp> ?
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Group::removeChild(NodePtr child) {
00064     unsigned int index = getChildIndex(child);
00065     if (index<children.size()) {
00066         removeChildren(index);
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void Group::removeChildren(unsigned int startIndex, unsigned int numberOfChildrenToRemove) {
00071     unsigned int endOfRemoveRange = startIndex + numberOfChildrenToRemove;
00072     if (endOfRemoveRange > getNumberOfChildren()) // crop the range
00073     {
00074         LOG(WARNING) << "Cropping the range of children to be removed.";
00075         endOfRemoveRange = getNumberOfChildren();
00076     }
00077 
00078     for(unsigned i= startIndex; i < endOfRemoveRange; ++i)
00079     {
00080         getChild(i)->removeParent(this);
00081     }
00082 
00083     children.erase(children.begin() + startIndex, children.begin() + endOfRemoveRange);
00084 }
00085 
00086 unsigned int Group::getChildIndex(NodePtr node){
00087     for (unsigned int childIndex = 0; childIndex < getNumberOfChildren(); ++childIndex)
00088     {
00089         if (children[childIndex] == node) {
00090                 return childIndex;
00091         }
00092     }
00093     return getNumberOfChildren(); // not found.
00094 }
00095 
00096 unsigned int Group::getChildIndex(Node* node) {
00097     for (unsigned int childIndex = 0; childIndex < getNumberOfChildren(); ++childIndex)
00098     {
00099         if (children[childIndex].get() == node) {
00100                 return childIndex;
00101         }
00102     }
00103     return getNumberOfChildren(); // not foun
00104 }
00105 
00106 Group::NodePtr Group::getChild(unsigned int index) {
00107         return children[index];
00108 }
00109 
00110 unsigned int Group::getNumberOfChildren() const {
00111         return static_cast<unsigned int>(children.size());
00112 }
00113 
00114 void Group::accept(INodeVisitor* visitor){
00115         visitor->visit(this);
00116         if (visitor->getDirection() == INodeVisitor::upwards) { //TODO move to "traverseUpwards" method?
00117             for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfParents(); ++i) // recursively go up the graph structure
00118             {
00119                 getParent(i)->accept(visitor);
00120             }
00121         } else if (visitor->getDirection() == INodeVisitor::downwards) { //TODO move to "traverseDownwards" method?
00122                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfChildren(); ++i) // recursively go down the graph structure
00123                 {
00124                         getChild(i)->accept(visitor);
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 }

00131 } // namespace brics_3d
